mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files(file_category, uploader_id, uuid, original_file_name, saved_file_name, upload_path, file_size) VALUES (#{fileCategory}, #{uploaderId}, #{uuid}, #{originalFileName}, #{savedFileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileSize})
INSERT INTO posts(file_no, writer_id, title, content, category, num_of_page ) VALUES (#{fileNo}, #{writerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{numOfPage} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY write_date DESC
